languages.text: {n}Сержант грустно усмехается.{/n} "Выберемся? Я один раз уже поверил, что отсюда можно спастись, и вот что из этого вышло. Простите, Ваша Светлость, но я пока что попридержу свой оптимизм".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант грустно усмехается.{/n} "Выберемся? Я один раз уже поверил, что отсюда можно спастись, и вот что из этого вышло. Простите, Ваша Светлость, но я пока что попридержу свой оптимизм".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант грустно усмехается.{/n} "Выберемся? Я один раз уже поверил, что отсюда можно спастись, и вот что из этого вышло. Простите, Ваша Светлость, но я пока что попридержу свой оптимизм".

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "Once we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape from this place. I believed it, and here's the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I'm going to withhold my optimism for now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "Once we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape from this place. I believed it, and here's the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I'm going to withhold my optimism for now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "Once we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape from this place. I believed it, and here's how it transpired. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I cannot seem to muster enough optimism right now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "Once we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape from this place. I believed it, and here's how it transpired. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I cannot seem to muster enough optimism right now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}彼はおどけたように笑う。{/n}「ここを出たら、ですか？前にも聞いたことがあります。ここから抜け出すことが可能だというような言葉を。私はそれを信じ、そのせいでこのような結果になったのです。お許しください、陛下。今は楽観的な気持ちにはなれません」
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はおどけたように笑う。{/n}「ここを出たら、ですか？前にも聞いたことがあります。ここから抜け出すことが可能だというような言葉を。私はそれを信じ、そのせいでこのような結果になったのです。お許しください、陛下。今は楽観的な気持ちにはなれません」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}他笑了起来，但笑声中没有丝毫笑意。{/n}“您是说，等我们逃出去之后吗？这种话我以前也听过，说什么有可能从这个地方逃出去。我听信了那些话，结果变成了现在这个样子。很抱歉，大人，但我恐怕乐观不起来。”
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}他笑了起来，但笑声中没有丝毫笑意。{/n}“您是说，等我们逃出去之后吗？这种话我以前也听过，说什么有可能从这个地方逃出去。我相信了那些话，结果变成了这个样子。很抱歉，大人，但我现在恐怕乐观不起来。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Se ríe sin humor.{/n} «¿Cuando salgamos, dice? A otro perro con ese hueso. Ya me dijeron antes que es posible escapar de este lugar. Lo creí, y ya ha visto el resultado. Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero ando un poco escaso de optimismo».
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se ríe sin humor.{/n} «¿Cuando salgamos, dice? A otro perro con ese hueso. Ya me dijeron antes que es posible escapar de este lugar. Lo creí, y sabe bien cómo terminó el asunto. Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero ando un poco escaso de optimismo».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Er lacht freudlos.{/n} "Wenn wir hier raus sind? Das habe ich schon mal gehört. Dass man von diesem Ort entkommen kann. Ich habe es geglaubt und das ist das Ergebnis. Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich kann gerade nicht sonderlich viel Optimismus aufbringen."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lacht freudlos.{/n} "Wenn wir hier raus sind? Das habe ich schon mal gehört. Dass man von hier entkommen kann. Ich habe es geglaubt, und jetzt seht mich an. Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich kann gerade nicht sonderlich viel Optimismus aufbringen."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Il ricane d'un air sombre.{/n} « Dès que nous serons sortis d'ici, vous dites ? On m'a déjà fait le coup une fois, de me faire croire que c'était possible de s'évader de cet endroit. Je suis tombé dans le panneau, et voilà le résultat. Alors, vous m'excuserez, Votre Seigneurie, mais mon niveau d'optimisme est présentement au plus bas. »
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ricane d'un air sombre.{/n} « Dès que nous serons sortis d'ici, vous dites ? On m'a déjà fait le coup une fois. De me faire croire que c'était possible de s'évader de cet endroit. Je suis tombé dans le panneau, et voilà le résultat. Alors, pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais mon niveau d'optimisme est présentement au plus bas. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: {n}Keyifsizce kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Kurtulduğumuzda mı dediniz? Bunu daha önce de duymuştum. Buradan kaçmanın mümkün olduğunu söylenmişti. Buna inandım ve sonucu görüyorsunuz. Kusuruma bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak şu anda o kadar iyimser bakamıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles mirthlessly.{/n} "When we get out, you say? I've heard that one before. That it's possible to escape this place. I believed it, and this is the result. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I can't seem to muster enough optimism right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Keyifsizce kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Kurtulduğumuzda mı dediniz? Bunu daha önce de duymuştum. Buradan kaçmanın mümkün olduğunu söylemişlerdi. Buna inandım ve sonucu görüyorsunuz. Kusuruma bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak şu anda yeterince iyimserliğe sahip değilim."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
